law.catch_line: Registered office and registered agent -- Requirement for agent's written acceptance of appointment.
law.text: Each corporation shall continuously maintain in this Commonwealth a registered office and a registered agent that comply with KRS 14A.4-010.
law.history: Amended 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 29, sec. 8, effective June 8, 2011. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 341, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 29, effective January 1, 1989.
